# createRequest()

**Instance Method**

Creates a new password authorization request.

## Declaration

```swift
func createRequest() -> ASAuthorizationPasswordRequest
```

## Return Value

A password authorization request that you can execute with an instance of [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASAuthorizationController].

## Creating Requests

- **ASAuthorizationPasswordRequest**: An authorization request that uses credentials stored in the keychain.
